descriptionHtml:
Live Wallpaper ❤️ Themes for Samsung Galaxy S9 is a free wallpapers app with HD backgrounds, clock, magic touch, emoji, 3D wallpaper, animated multicolored particles and more!

⭐Free Live Wallpapers⭐
Live Wallpaper ❤️ Themes for Samsung Galaxy S9 has multiple moving wallpapers with daisy flowers and blue glow images, pink and blue backgrounds, black amoled HD wallpaper, multiple customize options like background changer, frames, animated multicolored particles, magic touch, analog clock, emoji, your name and more, that work on the lock screen and they are all FREE!

❤️Free Android Wallpapers❤️
The HD live wallpapers work on most Android phones, such as Samsung Galaxy phones, and can be used as p5w backgrounds, Xiaomi live wallpapers, wallpaper for Oppo phones and more! Live Wallpaper for Samsung S9 and the black amoled and blue glow HD wallpaper works on tablets too!

⭐Customize⭐
Create your own themes by adding clocks, frames, emoji, animated multicolored particles, magic touch to the background changer, or even make it a 3D wallpaper or 4D wallpaper (parallax wallpaper with parallax effect). It works on the lock screen too!

❤️Give It Parallax Effect!❤️
Live Wallpaper ❤️ Themes for Samsung Galaxy S9 can be applied as a black amoled 3D wallpaper or 4D wallpaper. The parallax wallpaper has 3D depth and gives your screen and black amoled HD wallpapers a cool effect!

⭐Multiple Free Backgrounds⭐
You can choose one of our many HD backgrounds or you can add your own pictures! You can set up an automatic background changer with magic touch!

❤️How to customize❤️

💖 choose a free background or add your selfie
💖 set an automatic background changer
💖 add photo frames to the Live Wallpaper for Samsung S9
💖 change the animated multicolored particles on the lock screen
💖 add magic touch (color particle and sound)
💖 add moving emoji from your keyboard
💖 make the live wallpaper a 3D wallpaper or 4D wallpaper (parallax wallpaper)
💖 add your name or custom text

The Live Wallpaper for Samsung S9 app free has some of the best wallpapers for your Android phone and frequent cool new background themes!

Get the best wallpapers with free phone backgrounds and enjoy this live wallpaper free!

Other Live Wallpapers:

✔️Autumn Flowers Live Wallpaper ❤️ Luxurious Theme
✔️Diamond wallpaper free
✔️Flowers Blossoms Clock 🌺 Watch Wallpaper

You can add this hd live wallpapers to all phones: Samsung and Samsung Galaxy (even J7 prime), Xiaomi, Huawei, LG, Lenovo, Sony, Pixel, HTC, ASUS, Meizu, Motorola, Nexus and others! 😊
